c:capability.name: Schedule
c:capability.c:description: A schedule is a set of commands and when they are run. In general these appear as multi-instance capabilities on a Scheduler.

c:attribute.name: group
c:attribute.description: The scheduling group. Only one Schedule in a scheduling group may be enabled at a time.

c:attribute.name: enabled
c:attribute.description: Whether or not this scheduled is currently enabled to run. When disabled no scheduled commands will be sent.

c:attribute.name: nextFireTime
c:attribute.description: The next time the schedule will fire, this may be null if the schedule is disabled or there are no scheduled times.

c:attribute.name: nextFireCommand
c:attribute.description: The command that will be sent when it fires next. This is a key into the commands attribute.

c:attribute.name: lastFireTime
c:attribute.description: The last time the schedule executed a command.

c:attribute.name: lastFireCommand
c:attribute.description: The id of the last command that was executed. This may not exist in the commands attribute if the schedule has been modified since it last fired.

c:attribute.name: lastFireMessageType
c:attribute.description: The type of message that was sent on last execution.

c:attribute.name: lastFireAttributes
c:attribute.description: The attributes that were sent on last execution.

c:method.name: Delete
c:method.description: Deletes this Schedule and removes any scheduled commands.

c:method.name: DeleteCommand
c:method.description: Deletes any occurrences of the scheduled command from this Schedule.

c:parameter.name: commandId
c:parameter.description: The id of the command to delete.

c:return.name: applied
c:return.description: Whether or not the command was deleted, if this is false it already did not exist.
